document.full_text: the los angeles lakers snapped a five-game losing streak with a 102-93 victory over the san antonio spurs on tuesday, but the win was marred by a knee injury to starting center andrew bynum.
document.title: bynum injured as lakers snap 5-game losing streak
lines_and_colors: the los angeles lakers snapped a five-game losing streak with a 102-93 victory over the san antonio spurs on tuesday, but the win was marred by a knee injury to starting center andrew bynum.
